title: Spelling it out
creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development and Sabina Baltrukomis
brief_description: Shows the teaching of spelling in primary schools from the nineteenth century to the present day. Could be used in conjunction with the Victorian Education Department’s booklet “The Teaching of spelling”. Changing attitudes and a variety of teaching methods are also looked at.
